tooltip.portal_via: Via: connects metal layers in a chip, just like this portal connects lanes
tooltip.boss_chamber: Clock Root Buffer: distributes timing signals across the entire chip
tooltip.power_rail_VDD: VDD: positive supply voltage rail powering all logic gates
tooltip.power_rail_VSS: VSS: ground rail completing the circuit for all cells
tooltip.connector_boost: Scribe Line: test channels between die sites on a wafer
tooltip.obstacle_CELL: Standard Cell: pre-designed logic block â€” the LEGO brick of chip design
tooltip.obstacle_TAP: Substrate Tap: connects transistor substrate to power/ground
tooltip.obstacle_VIA: Via Stack: vertical metal connections between routing layers
tooltip.obstacle_BUF: Buffer: amplifies weak signals to drive long wires
tooltip.obstacle_DIE: Die: individual chip cut from a silicon wafer
tooltip.obstacle_PCM: PCM: Process Control Monitor for testing manufacturing quality
tooltip.mob_photon: Photon: EUV light particles etch circuit patterns at 13.5nm wavelength
tooltip.mob_dopant: Dopant: atoms implanted into silicon to control conductivity
tooltip.mob_alpha: Alpha Particle: cosmic rays that can flip bits in memory chips
tooltip.pickup_WAFER: Wafer: 300mm silicon disc â€” foundation of every chip
tooltip.pickup_EUV: EUV Lithography: $150M machines that print circuits with extreme UV light
tooltip.pickup_TSV_BOOSTER: TSV: Through-Silicon Via â€” vertical connections in 3D stacked chips
tooltip.pickup_PHOTORESIST: Photoresist: light-sensitive coating that defines circuit patterns
tooltip.pickup_CMP_PAD: CMP: Chemical-Mechanical Polishing â€” planarizes wafer surfaces
tooltip.cell_turret: Cell Turret: capture these to control territory â€” like dominating fab capacity
tooltip.boss_NVIDIA: NVIDIA: GPU giant whose AI chips consume vast quantities of HBM memory
tooltip.boss_Apple: Apple: designs custom ARM chips (M-series) pushing fab process limits
tooltip.boss_TSMC: TSMC: world's largest foundry, manufactures chips for Apple/NVIDIA/AMD
tooltip.boss_Google: Google: develops TPU AI accelerators requiring advanced packaging
tooltip.boss_META: META: building custom AI inference chips for social media workloads
